card.name: Asuran Soldier
card.property: Dominion. Replicator Vassal. Asuran Soldier gets revive cost -1 for each other Replicator adversary at the current mission. When you score Asuran Soldier, you may draw a card.

card.name: Baal Clone
card.property: Dominion. Goa'uld Vassal. You can have up to six Baal Clone adversaries in your deck, but not more than three in play simultaneously. Baal gets revive cost -1 for each Baal Clone assigned with him.

card.name: Bak'al
card.property: Outlaw. Failure: For each complication at the current mission, destroy an assigned support character. You may take Bak'al into hand.

card.name: "Bob"
card.property: Destroy "Bob" - Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose two cards among them. Your opponent discards one of these two and drains X, where X is equal to the cost of the other card.

card.name: Borzin
card.property: Outlaw. Destroy Borzin - Stop a character, or a gear, or a hero ship.

card.name: Committee Member
card.property: Dominion. Political Vassal. When you score Committee Member, gain 1 power for each failed mission this turn.

card.name: Enforcer
card.property: Outlaw. Purge Enforcer, pay 1 power - Play a complication at no cost. Draw a card.

card.name: Fourth
card.property: Each time you revive Fourth, place the top card of your deck face down beneath her. Discard a card from beneath Fourth - Gain 1 power and draw a card.

card.name: Gavos
card.property: Outlaw. Destroy Gavos - Gain 1 power for each complication at the current mission.

card.name: Jaffa Commander
card.property: Dominion. Jaffa and Goa'uld Vassal. When you score Jaffa Commander, you may search your deck for a Jaffa villain card, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck.

card.name: Kassa Smuggler
card.property: Dominion. Outlaw. One adversary with outlaw and any number of Kassa Smuggler adversaries can be assigned to the same mission. When you score Kassa Smuggler, you may take into hand any number of cards played as complications at this mission.

card.name: Mirror Teal'c
card.property: Each time you assign Mirror Teal'c, your opponent may stop any number of characters with a total of 3 Culture or more. If they don't, stop a character.

card.name: Netan
card.property: Outlaw. Each time you play a complication, you may draw a card. Each time a bounty token is destroyed, you may ready Netan. Stop Netan, pay 2 power - Place a bounty token on a character who doesn't have one. (It costs 1 power to assign a character with a bounty token, or 2 power to destroy a bounty token.)

card.name: Nirrti
card.property: You may boost Nirrti with any Disease obstacle card. While Nirrti is assigned, Disease obstacles have dominion.

card.name: Ori Commander
card.property: Dominion. Ori Vassal. When you score Ori Commander, you may search your deck for an Ori obstacle, reveal it, take it into hand, and shuffle your deck.

card.name: Worrel
card.property: Outlaw. Worrel gets difficulty +1 for each complication at the current mission.

card.name: Wraith Commander
card.property: Each time you assign Wraith Commander, your opponent drains 3. Each time a support character card is placed in your opponent's discard pile, Wraith Commander gets revive cost -1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Wraith Hunter
card.property: Dominion. Wraith Vassal. When you score Committee Member, your opponent must drain 4.

card.name: Dillon Everett
card.property: Dillon Everett gets Combat +1 during the first mission you play each turn.

card.name: Dr. Hutchison
card.property: Stop Dr. Hutchison, pay 2 power - Unblock another character. This costs power -2 if it targets an SGC character.

card.name: Eli Wallace
card.property: Eli Wallace costs power -1 to play for each complication at the current mission.

card.name: Everett Young
card.property: Each time you play a Science mission, you may stop Everett Young and discard a card. If you do, ready another character.

card.name: F.R.An.
card.property: Stop and destroy F.R.An., pay 3 power - Destroy a replicator obstacle or an assigned Replicator adversary at the current mission.

card.name: Helia
card.property: When you play Helia, your opponent may play a complication at no cost. Stop Helia - The next activated ability on your Ancient gear or Ancient ship you activate this turn costs power -2.

card.name: Larrin
card.property: When you play Larrin, you may stop her. If you do, the current mission becomes an Ingenuity mission.

card.name: Lycus
card.property: Science missions get difficulty +1.

card.name: Mirror Kawalsky
card.property: Each time you assign Mirror Kawalsky, draw a card for each assigned team character who has a glyph.

card.name: Mirror Hammond
card.property: Destroy Mirror Hammond - Destroy all complications at the current mission.

card.name: Nevik
card.property: Stop Nevik - The next hero ship you play this turn costs power -1 to play. Stop and destroy Nevik - The next hero ship you play this turn costs power -2 to play.

card.name: Nicholas Rush
card.property: Nicholas Rush costs power -1 to play for each obstacle at the current mission.

card.name: Ronald Greer
card.property: Each time you assign Ronald Greer, you may pay 1 power. If you don't, reveal the top card of your deck, and if it's a villain card, ready Ronald Greer and block him from the current mission instead.

card.name: Tamara Johansen
card.property: Tamara Johansen gets skills -1 during the first mission you play each turn.

card.name: Bauer
card.property: Each time a team character earns a glyph they did not already have, you may place a promotion token on them. Each time an NID character gets a promotion token, you may pay 3 power. If you do, destroy an adversary.

card.name: Cameron Mitchell
card.property: Cameron Mitchell gets skills -1 while assigned to the first mission played each turn, unless he has at least two glyphs.

card.name: Daniel Jackson
card.property: Daniel Jackson can't be assigned. While Daniel Jackson is ready, each other team character gets skills +1. At the end of your power phase, draw a card for each different glyph your team characters have.

card.name: Inago
card.property: Libra: Inago gets Science +2 while you have at least three gears. Pisces:Inago gets Combat +2 while you have at least three gears. Destroy a gear - Draw two cards.

card.name: Ishta
card.property: Each time Ishta earns a glyph, you may play a Jaffa support character at no cost. Gemini: You may boost Ishta with any Jaffa character card.

card.name: John Sheppard
card.property: Each time you assign John Sheppard to a mission that has a glyph matching one of his, you may pay 1 power and discard a card. If you do, choose one: destroy an obstacle; or destroy all complications; or he gets skills +1 until the end of the current mission.

card.name: Lya
card.property: Lya can't be assigned to Combat missions. Orion: Stop Lya - Ready any number of assigned characters. Your opponent gains power and draws cards equal to the number of readied characters.

card.name: Mirror Carter
card.property: To assign Mirror Carter, pay 1 power and discard a card. Scorpius: Assigning Mirror Carter costs power -1. Triangulum: Each time you assign Mirror Carter, you may draw a card.

card.name: Mirror O'Neill
card.property: Failure: You may pay 3 power. If you do, ready Mirror O'Neill. Libra: Each time Mirror O'Neill becomes ready, he gets skills +1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Rodney McKay
card.property: Orion: Rodney McKay gets skills +1 while the total difficulty of the current mission is 8 or greater. Scorpius: Rodney McKay gets skills +1 while there is at least one obstacle with a Failure text at the current mission.

card.name: Ronon Dex
card.property: At the start of the game, search your deck for a Particle Magnum gear, play it at no cost, and shuffle your deck. Gemini or Pisces: Each time you use a Particle Magnum gear, wound the targeted adversary an additional time. Then, you may act again.

card.name: Skaara
card.property: Gemini or Libra: Stop Skaara - Block an adversary from the current mission. Gemini and Pisces: Stop and incapacitate Skaara - Destroy all obstacles and complications at the current mission.

card.name: "Tyler"
card.property: When you build your deck, you may add "Tyler" to your team as its fifth member. If you do, your opponent's victory total is halved (rounded down). At the start of each of your turns, "Tyler" gets a hero affiliation trait of your choice. Gemini: "Tyler" gets Combat +2.

card.name: Warrick
card.property: Stop Warrick - Ready a hearo ship. Libra: Villain ships get firepower -1. Scorpius: Hero ships get firepower +1.

card.name: Emergency Evacuation
card.property: Your opponent chooses an assigned character. They may stop the chosen character. Ready all assigned characters except the chosen one.

card.name: Recognition
card.property: The current mission gets: "Success: Place a promotion token on an assigned team character."

card.name: Sudden Epiphany
card.property: Move a glyph from one character to another, then draw a number of cards equal to the number of glyphs the receiving character has, plus one if both characters share an affiliation trait.

card.name: Talion
card.property: The current mission gets: "Success: You may incapacitate an assigned team character. If you do, choose one: purge an assigned adversary; or your opponent purges a card from their villain score pile."

card.name: Wraith Infighting
card.property: You can only play this event if your opponent has two or more villain ships. Your opponent destroys a villain ship.

card.name: Control Chair
card.property: Stop this gear, pay 3 power - Place a Drone counter on this gear. Stop this gear, stop an Ancient character, remove a Drone counter from this gear - Destroy a Combat obstacle or an assigned villain ship.

card.name: Research Submersible
card.property: Each time a character earns a glyph, you may destroy this gear. If you do, choose another character with a triggered effect that triggers when they earn a glyph, and trigger it as if that character had earned the same glyph.

card.name: Serpent Guard Armor
card.property: Destroy this gear - Choose a team character. During your opponent's next turn, they become a Jaffa adversary with revive cost 5, who can't be scored, and if they would leave play for any reason, they are incapacitated instead.

card.name: Air Assault
card.property: Victory: Your opponent drains X, where X is equal to the total firepower of your assigned Wraith ships.

card.name: Attack of the Clones
card.property: Dominion. (When you score an adversary, you may also score one other card with dominion.) Goa'uld adversaries get difficulty +1.

card.name: Beamed Down Troops
card.property: Dominion. When you play this obstacle, reveal the top five cards of your deck, take a Wraith card from among them into hand (if any), and place the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Company of Thieves
card.property: Dominion. Outlaw. When you play this obstacle, choose an assigned character. They get skills -1 for each complication at the current mission.

card.name: Early Retirement
card.property: When you play this obstacle, destroy all promotion tokens on a character.

card.name: Erasing Heresy
card.property: Failure: Choose a hero card in your opponent's discard pile and purge it. Search their deck and hand and purge all other copies of that card. Purge this obstacle. Your opponent shuffles their hand and discard pile into their deck and refills their hand.

card.name: Forgotten Knowledge
card.property: When you play this obstacle, both you and your opponent draw four cards.

card.name: Invasive Flora
card.property: When you play this obstacle, your opponent loses 1 power. Each time you pass, your opponent loses 1 power.

card.name: Kassa
card.property: Dominion. Outlaw. Each time you play a complication, your opponent must discard a card.

card.name: Lucian Alliance Thugs
card.property: Dominion. Outlaw. This obstacle gets difficulty +1 for each other card with outlaw at the current mission.

card.name: Reassembly
card.property: Failure: Take a Replicator card from your discard pile into hand and draw aa number of cards equal to the number of other Replicator cards at the current mission.

card.name: Rough Interrogation
card.property: Outlaw. Failure: For each complication at the current mission, wound an assigned character.

card.name: Schizophrenia
card.property: Failure: Place this obstacle on an assigned character. To assign them, their owner must pay power equal to the number of other ready characters. This obstacle is destroyed when your opponent succeeds at a mission.

card.name: SGC Breach
card.property: Failure: Choose one: Incapacitate an assigned SGC team character; or destroy an SGC support character; or destroy an SGC gear.

card.name: Sneak Attack
card.property: When you play this obstacle, destroy an assigned support character. If a Jaffa adversary is assigned, choose another support character. They are blocked.

card.name: Strength in Numbers
card.property: Outlaw. This obstacle costs power -1 to play for each other card with outlaw at the current mission. (This does not reduce the cost of using this obstacle's outlaw keyword.)

card.name: Swift Strike
card.property: When you play this obstacle, wound an assigned character. Then, you may act again.

card.name: Under Heavy Fire
card.property: At any time, if a character with one or more wound tokens on them has all their skills reduced to 0, incapacitate them if they're a team character, or destroy them if they're a support character.

card.name: The George Hammond
card.property: Victory: Your opponent may pay 2 power. If they don't, they take a card from their villain score pile and shuffles it into their deck.

card.name: International Space Station
card.property: Stop this ship - The next support character you play this turn costs power -1 to play.

card.name: Orion
card.property: Pay 2 power - Block a villain ship from the current mission. Victory: Villain ships that would be incapacitated as a result of this mission's ship battle are destroyed instead.

card.name: Lucian Alliance Al'kesh
card.property: Outlaw. This ship gets firepower +1 for each other ship with outlaw at the current mission. Each time you assign this ship, you may pay 1 power. If you do, play a complication at no cost.

card.name: Lucian Alliance Tel'tak
card.property: Outlaw. Each time you assign this ship, you may return an adversary with outlaw to your hand. If you do, gain power equal to that adversary's cost -1.

card.name: Wraith Hive
card.property: Each time you assign Wraith Hive, you may pay 3 power. If you do, search your deck for a Wraith Dart ship, play it at no cost, and shuffle your deck.
